H0.text: In which country did the Internet start. United Kingdom

H1.text: In which country did the Internet start. Canada

H2.text: In which country did the Internet start. Australia

H3.text: In which country did the Internet start. US

A4.text: The Advanced Research Projects Agency Network (ARPANET) was established by the Advanced Research Projects Agency (now DARPA) of the United States Department of Defense.

A5.text: Bob Kahn moved to DARPA and, together with Vint Cerf at Stanford University, formulated the Transmission Control Program for internetworking.
